Name: Chordwatch
About the game: The ultimate music theory companion app. Are you a musician, producer, teacher or otherwise music tinkerer? Chordwatch makes the headache of learning chord names and scales extremely easy. Remove the mystery of music theory and instantly uncover anything you play. Standalone or with your DAW, Chordwatch is the ultimate sidekick for your music! Reveal any Chord! With real-time chord recognition , Chordwatch shows what you play while you play. Simply connect your MIDI instrument (or keyboard and mouse) and instantly see the chord names , inversions , intervals and TAB of any notes played! Chordwatch even displays the chord symbol in your system tray. So you always know what you're playing, whilst saving precious screen space. Visualize any Scale or Mode Chordwatch packs comprehensive scale key highlights and chord previews for over 90 scales and modes , including all Greek modes and diatonic chords . Helping you to easily learn any scale and discover fitting chords. Never play a wrong note again with off-scale muting! Pop-out the resizable piano roll for a fully themeable 88 keys. Automagic TAB A dynamic fretboard automatically generates the TAB for the chords you play, providing multiple fingering options along the guitar neck, adjusted for any custom tuning . Making it easy and fun to pick and strum. Play with Friends! With LivePlay you can share your piano with anyone. Using innovative low-latency web tech, the exact notes and chords of you and your peers are kept in-sync and in-time . Enabling students, teachers, musicians, and friends to remotely practice and play together! Works with your DAW Chordwatch works great standalone , or with your favorite music software. Built-in MIDI passthrough gives you all the power of Chordwatch whilst using the apps you know and love.
